trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the transaction locking behavior for the connection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pending changes from more highly isolated transactions cannot be overwritten.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Shared locks are held while the data is being read to avoid dirty reads, but the data can be changed before the end of the transaction, resulting in non-repeatable reads or phantom data.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xx xxxxx xxxxx xxxxx$ xxx xxx xxxx xxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx xx xxx$xxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A dirty read is possible, meaning that no shared locks are issued and no exclusive locks are honored.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Locks are placed on all data that is used in a query, preventing other users from updating the data.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxx xx xxxx xx x xxxxx$ xxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Prevents non-repeatable reads but phantom rows are still possible.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxxxxxx xxx$xxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reduces blocking by storing a version of data that one application can read while another is modifying the same data.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx x xxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Indicates that from one transaction you cannot see changes made in other transactions, even if you requery.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx$ xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A different isolation level than the one specified is being used, but the level cannot be determined.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx$ xxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
